name: Retro Classix Remakes Sixpack
description:
Relive the days of the classic home computer era with the remakes of some of the all-time classics from those days on your MAC.
Master tricky platform action in "Jump Boy", challenge yourself in exciting races with pit stops or a quick karate fight against challenging opponents. Protect the mine workers on the moon from alien attacks, sink submarines in the remake of "Seawolf III," or maneuver your "River Attack" jet skillfully across the river - past your besiegers. Enjoy the touch of nostalgic retro feel!

- Remakes of some favourite classics of the home computer era
- Contains the 6 retro classics:
- Jump Boy Remake
- Drop Sector Remake
- Pitstart Remake
- Karate Remake
- River Attack Remake
- Seawolf III
